com.mistfalls.finances.models

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mistfalls.finances.models.Account

  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    Domain model of a mutable Account.
    Author:
    Mark LeBlanc

      Account(Currency balance)

      • commit

        public boolean commit(Transaction transaction,
             Account account)
        Stores and finalizes a transaction on affected accounts. Do we really need to be doing double-entry bookkeeping?
        Parameters:
        transaction - The transaction to take place.
        Returns:
        Whether the transaction was successfully commited.
